radiographic_examinations.findings: Coarse reticular nodular opacities bilaterally and decreased lung volumes consistent with lung fibrosis and bronchiectasis, with no evidence of pleural effusions.
Small lung volumes, diffuse ground-glass opacification, bronchiectasis, and architectural distortion in the upper lobes with diffuse honeycombing predominantly in the subpleural location.
Reduced lung volumes, diffuse parenchymal opacity, traction bronchiectasis in the upper zones, and bilateral hilar lymphadenopathy.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Contrast-enhanced CT scan of the chest
radiographic_examinations.findings: Lymphadenopathy in the hilar, prevascular, paratracheal, and subcarinal regions, enlarged main pulmonary artery, diffuse ground-glass opacity throughout the lungs, volume loss at the lung apexes, architectural distortion, traction bronchiectasis, peripheral cicatricial emphysema, and honeycomb-like cystic changes in the lung apexes.
